DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine feasibility safety Transcutaneous Vagus Nerve Stimulation ( tVNS ) healthy control . Tested healthy subject ( HS ) physiological effect tVNS different stimulation parameter . The electrical stimulation variable pulse width , frequency , current . This tested laboratory set measure tVNS effect heart rate , respiration rate , blood pressure , perceive pain . This feasibility small safety study . Hypothesis : tVNS feasible safe
DOC.brief_title: Parametric Testing Direct Physiological Effects Transcutaneous Vagus Nerve Stimulation ( tVNS ) Healthy Controls
DOC.criteria: Meets none Exclusion Criteria History seizure , depression , pain condition Taking prescription medication ( exclude contraceptive statin ) History ear trauma History heart condition Has heart pacemaker artificial valve Has metal implant waste Is pregnant Alcohol Dependence Illicit drug use past 6 month History brain surgery lesion History loss consciousness ( > 15 min ) Faint sight blood Hospitalization surgeries past 6 month
